Author: h1arc
Name: ModernWrathCombo
Punchline: Simple high-performance combo system for FFXIV
Description: ModernWrathCombo is a clean slate rewrite focusing on simplicity and performance. Ultra-fast action resolution with modern .NET 9 patterns and minimal complexity. Hugely inspired by WrathCombo.
Changelog: Phase 1 Alpha - Clean slate foundation with ultra-fast action resolution
